sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The true mother church, or, A short practical discourse upon Acts II, concerning the first church at Jerusalem Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703. Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703. Second five year's struggle against popery and tyranny.
[3], 20 p.
Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., London : 1688.
Attributed to Samuel Johnson by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Imprimatur: dated Nov. 15, 1687; signed Jo. Battely. Also appears as pages 307-325 of Johnson's Second five year's struggle against popery and tyranny (Wing J843) at reel 386:10. Imperfect: stained with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[3], 20 p.
Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., London : 1688.
Attributed to Samuel Johnson by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Imprimatur: dated Nov. 15, 1687; signed Jo. Battely. Also appears as pages 307-325 of Johnson's Second five year's struggle against popery and tyranny (Wing J843) at reel 386:10. Imperfect: stained with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
